citations.narrative:
*** The center wire panel in the lynx enclosure has rusted through and now the wire is broken creating a hole with
broken protruding wires. This section of wire panel needs to be removed or replaced to prevent injury to the animal.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.

narrative:
3.125(a)                    REPEAT
FACILITIES, GENERAL.   
*** The center wire panel in the lynx enclosure has rusted through and now the wire is broken creating a hole with
broken protruding wires. This section of wire panel needs to be removed or replaced to prevent injury to the animal.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
